settings.title: COVID-19:
settings.text:
Unfortunately, the effects of COVID-19 have impacted our shipping and all orders will be delayed in delivery by 7-10 business days.

That said, we’ve all been impacted in one way or another. It’s important that we remain strong and stand united in the fight against this crisis, just as we’ve done with all the others that have tried to rattle our country.

In the interim, TPS will remain committed to providing you, our customers, with only the highest-quality products and our utmost support in this trying time. Please contact us with any questions or concerns. Your satisfaction is our biggest objective– now and beyond this crisis.

settings.title: OUR MISSION:
settings.text: The strongest weapon in the United States is a patriotic American. Here at Tactical Pro Supply, we donate a portion of every sale to the PTSD Foundation of America because we believe that it is our duty to help those who have sacrificed their lives to defend our freedoms. Join us on our mission to build American pride and help our troops overcome the devastating effects of PTSD. We would be proud to have your support, and we are honoured by your patronage.

settings.info:
Professionally Printed Graphic

100% Cotton

Fits True to Size

Proceeds Donated to the PTSD Foundation
settings.info2: Join Team Tactical today for ONLY $1, then $20 on the first of each month after that or go with an annual membership of $220 and save 20%.

settings.text: Americas #1 Patriotic T-Shirt Subscription! Providing TRUE Patriots with monthly deliveries containing all new and exclusive Tactical Pro Supply T-Shirts in your preferred size!

settings.title: How fast do you ship?
settings.answer: Purchased items will be shipped within 2 business days of the order. Please allow up to 1 week from ship date for your delivery to arrive. If you still have not received your purchase after 1 week, please notify contact@tacticalprosupply.com and provide us with your order number.

settings.title: Domestic (USA) - USPS Mail
settings.answer: All domestic orders ship via USPS First Class or Priority mail depending on the weight of your package.

settings.title: International - USPS Mail
settings.answer: This is an American Company. We only ship within the United States of America.

settings.title: Please Note*
settings.answer: Tactical Pro Supply is not responsible for international shipping delays, such as customs delays and is not responsible for any customs duties or taxes. We are not responsible for any lost, stolen, or damaged shipments. The buyer assumes all responsibilities of claims made with the shipping carrier and all duties/fees incurred on the shipment. Please contact tacticalprosupply@gmail.com if you have any questions. Customs authorities require that we state the value of your order directly on your package this price is calculated by the retail cost. It is at the sole discretion of customs agents to release your package. Note, on rare occasions, customs agents may delay delivery of some packages. For more information on customs and duties charges, please contact your local customs office.

settings.title: HOLIDAY SCHEDULE
settings.answer:
Please note: Packages are shipped out on business days. The following are holidays and considered to be non-business days:
New Year’s Day
Martin Luther King’s Birthday
Presidents’ Day
Memorial Day
Independence Day
Labor Day
Thanksgiving Day
The Day After Thanksgiving Day
Christmas Day

settings.title: PO BOXES
settings.answer:
Orders shipping to international PO Boxes will be sent via USPS first-class. Tracking numbers are available through USPS until international package leaves the United States. Once your package leaves the United States it is then in the hands of your local post office and will not have a tracking number.
 
Packages going to Australia will be handed off to:
 
Australia Postal Corp -613 8847 9045
 
Packages going to the UK will be handed off to one of the two listed below:

Parcel Force- 08448 00 44 66
Royal Mail- 08457 740 740

settings.title: EXCHANGE RATES
settings.answer:
All prices shown on the website are in U.S. dollars. If you need a conversion to your local currency, please refer to yahoo.finance.com or a similar website. Exchange rates change daily, and we are not responsible for any loss incurred as a result of currency fluctuation. Please note that your credit card processor may charge you a conversion rate fee.

Credit Card will not work at Checkout:
You can always use PayPal.  Sometimes credit cards will not work due to the customer moving to a new address that does not match up with old address where he or she had the bank or credit card.

settings.title: RESET YOUR PASSWORD
settings.subtitle: We will send you an email to reset your password.

settings.title: For True Patriots
settings.text: The strongest weapon in the United States is a patriotic American. We make clothes for those who are proud to stand united with our brothers and sister who defend this great country.

settings.title: Proudly Made
settings.text: Print, packaging and shipping! We believe in providing the American people with premium quality products that represents everything this country stands for.

settings.title: American Quality
settings.text: These tees are made from 100% cotton with breathable performance. As our glorious nation, the inks resists the threats of fading from the sun and time. you’ll have comfort, fit, and looks that last.

settings.title: Tactical Designs
settings.text: Your t-shirts say a lot about you. Let your beliefs shine with our designs that say you are a patriot! Just wearing our powerful graphic tees can make you a bold builder of American pride.

settings.title:
HIGH QUALITY

PREMIUM SHIRTS
settings.text: Our distressed, heavyweight USA tshirts are designed, developed, and manufactured with the utmost care and attention to detail right here in the US. Our comfort-focused American flag clothes are for men or for women and are as durable as they come.
We are family owned and operated, and we believe in good old-fashioned red, white, and blue values. Pride in country, pride in self, and pride in our products. Best of all, we keep jobs in 'MERICA!

settings.title:
DESIGNED, PRINTED, PACKAGED,

AND SHIPPED IN THE USA
settings.text:
Our patriotic apparel company is based

entirely in the United States of America.

settings.title: EASY TO FOLLOW SIZING
settings.text: To determine which size to buy, see dimensions guide. Measurements are in inches and are measured when the shirt is lying flat on a hard surface. Width is measured armpit to armpit, and the length is measured from the very top of the shirt to the bottom.

settings.title: HELP US GIVE BACK TO THE PTSD FOUNDATION OF AMERICA!
settings.text: We proudly donate a portion of every single clothing purchase to our favorite charity, the PTSD Foundation which aids our active duty military and veterans across all branches: Army, Navy, Air Force, Marines, and Coast Guard. Support our troops. Do your part in providing hope and healing for the unseen wounds of war..
